attributes.action: Lower the cost of fuel to less than £1 indefinitely
attributes.background: Rising fuel costs have a massive impact on the economic stability of our country, causing businesses to fail from rising delivery costs, haulage companies to fail because of crippling fuel bills, the impact on everyday shopping costs to cover the cost of deliveries is rediculous. This needs to stop.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament don't decide directly on fuel prices. You could start a new petition calling for the tax on fuel to be reduced.
